      static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode foldTuple(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> in, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper, Optional<String> json_field)
      Takes a tuple expressed as LinkedHashMap (by convention the Objects are primitives, JsonNode, or POJO), and where one of the objects is a JSON representation of the original object and creates an object by folding them all together Note the other fields of the tuple take precedence over the JSON

      • foldTuple

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode foldTuple(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> in,
                                                                com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper,
                                                                Optional<String> json_field)
        Takes a tuple expressed as LinkedHashMap (by convention the Objects are primitives, JsonNode, or POJO), and where one of the objects is a JSON representation of the original object and creates an object by folding them all together Note the other fields of the tuple take precedence over the JSON
        Parameters:
        in - - the tuple
        mapper - - the Jackson object mapper
        json_field - - optional fieldname of the string representation of the JSON - if not present then the last field is used (set to eg "" if there is no base object)
        Returns:
